All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, Laziness, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class WelcomeWizardPage
extends GraphicWizardPage

WelcomeWizardPage is a pre-build wizard page to display welcome information. It usually has graphic in left pane.

See Also:
Serialized Form
